001package imagingbook.lib.pdf;
002
003public abstract class Utils {
004        
005        public static boolean verifyPdfLib() {
006                try {
007                        if (Class.forName("com.lowagie.text.Document") != null) {
008                                return true;
009                        }
010                } catch (ClassNotFoundException e) { }
011                return false;
012        }
013
014}
